artist: Painter: After Jacopo Tintoretto; Engraver: Hamlet Winstanley
description: Jesus sitting to right with hand on chest, leaning toward Nicodemus sitting with back to viewer; five other men including one holding candle; interior view with door at left
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: Tintoret pinxit   Alt: 3 ped 1 pol: Lat: 2 ped 5 pol  apud Knowsley  H. Winstanley fecit / Nicodemus Venit as Jesum Nocte.  Johan: Cap: 3 | on sheet in pencil: 2-477
title: Nicodemus Came to Jesus by Night
